Detailed Description

Base class for DAZ Studio custom Mime data classes.

Member Function Documentation

int DzMimeData::decodeInt ( QByteArray &  bytes  )  [static, protected]

Convenience function to decode a single int value from MIME data. The value is decoded and removed from the front of the array.

Parameters:
bytes The MIME data to decode and remove the value from.
Returns:
The decoded value.

Returns:
The decoded value.
